summary:
- **Security Issuance**: 200,000 ordinary fully paid shares (HAR) issued on 11/07/2025 as partial settlement of a loan (non-cash consideration).  
- **Shareholder Approval**: Approved at General Meeting on 11 June 2025.  
- **Post-Issuance Capital Structure**:  
  - Quoted: 214,744,956 ordinary shares (HAR).  
  - Unquoted:  
    - 7.5M performance rights (HARAX),  
    - 5M performance shares (HARAE),  
    - 4M options expiring 07-Dec-2026 (HARAF),  
    - 20M options expiring 26-Jun-2028 (HARAZ).
